Plot: Former members of Saturday Night Live come together to remember the past 40 years of Saturday Night Live.
Title: Saturday Night Live: 40th Anniversary Special
Writer: James Anderson, Fred Armisen, Tina Fey, Steve Higgins, Chris Kelly, Erik Kenward, Seth Meyers, Lorne Michaels, John Mulaney, Paula Pell, Jeff Richmond, Akiva Schaffer, Tom Schiller, Sarah Schneider, Marc Shaiman, Michael Shoemaker, Robert Smigel, Emily Spivey, Kent Sublette, Jorma Taccone, Bryan H. Tucker, Andy Samberg
Actors: Fred Armisen, Dan Aykroyd, Alec Baldwin, Vanessa Bayer
Awards: Won 4 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 win & 6 nominations.
